1.name: Relentless Raccoon
1.description: Three punches to that special place. Never doubt a raccoon.

3.name: The Big Blaster
3.description: Enough firepower to blow up a moon...at least, a moon in the Raccooniverse.

signature.name: Furocity
signature.description: Rocket makes fur fly with increased Critical Hit Rate based on his Combo Meter.

description: Ain’t no thing like Rocket ‘cept Rocket – the Keystone Quadrant’s most notoriously cranky fur ball. He’s a master of gadgets with an affinity for heavy weapons, and is always down for a heist, especially if it involves blowing things up. He may be ornery, but he is extremely loyal to his teammates from The Guardians of The Galaxy. Just don’t call him a Raccoon!
